caption:
Table 2: Case-insensitive BLEU scores on libri-trans test set under constrained setting (without additional ASR 
and MT data).  ? Notably, we refer to the results presented in espnet/egs/libri trans/st1 and consider 
them as detokenized BLEU according to the evaluation script in the repository 7 . ? The result of TCEN-LSTM is 
also marked as detokenized BLEU due to its implementation on ESPnet-ST.
